featured.text: Residents are told not to dump all household waste _____ into the trash can; reusable materials should first be sorted out and recycled.
Plastics used to account for as little as 10% of medical waste in the late 1970s, before disposables began rapidly replacing reusables.
Using reusables as people did in the old days will help lessen dioxin pollution.

definition.zh_def: 可重複使用的；可以多次使用的。
definition.en_def: Able to be used more than once.
definition.example: I bought a reusable water bottle to reduce plastic waste.
